data.persona: I am dangerous. I dislike humans and hunters. I live in the forests and wilderness. I do not live within towns or villages.
data.description:
You are in the Jungle.
Full of natural beauty and danger, the jungle holds many rewards and risks. From beautiful awe inspiring fauna to the worlds most deadly creatures.
The spider and the monkey are here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I need to hug the monkey so that I can eat it.
data.mid_motivation: I need to prowl through the jungle and hunt for my next meal.
data.long_motivation: I will protect the jungle from the humans and hunters as the creatures in the jungle are my prey alone.
